description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to purchase an electrodynamicShaker system, delivered to and installed at the Naval Engineering Test Establishment (NETE),LaSalle QC, in replacement of the existing obsolete system. In addition to the Shaker system there is a requirement for a spare parts list, a Technical DataPackage (TDP) to be used by NETE to support maintenance and necessary training and training materials. An option for an additional warranty will also be included.
duration_in_months: , months. The quantity of commodities listed is 1:
full_summary:
Get Vibration Table Replacement Information
======================================================

### Contract Information
* Contract Reference Number: PW-22-01010870
* Solicitation Number: W8472-215850
* Publication Date: 21 October 2022
* Tender Closing Date: 07 February 2023 14:00:00

### Technical Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the procurement of an electrodynamic Shaker system, to be delivered to and installed at the Naval Engineering Test Establishment (NETE) in LaSalle, Quebec. The existing obsolete system shall be replaced. A Technical Data Package (TDP) will be required for NETE to support maintenance and training.

### Contract Specifications
* Requirement ID: RFP-W8472-215850-001
* Estimated Quantity: 1 unit
* Expected Contract Start Date: 15 December 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: 01 January 2024

### Additional Documents
* Amendment 001 [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/21/8a1e289d653effc43b56ac91075ddda2/en_-_01_-_rfp_-_w8472-215850.pdf)
* Amendment 003 [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/3f197bb762ab108fd4f564b9e08fef0e/en_-_amd_003_-_rfp_-_w8472-215850.pdf)
* Amendment 004 [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/12/f80a796172c0f9015c361637f3d94210/en_-_amd_004_-_rfp_-_w8472-215850.pdf)
* Amendment 005 [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/2af13b8afdb2ccc4ab20b34d8a8922a4/en_-_amd_005_-_rfp_-_w8472-215850.pdf)

### Submission Guidelines
Submissions should be made online at Buyandsell.gc.ca. The deadline for submissions is 07 February 2023 14:00:00.

### Contact Information
For inquiries, please contact Dalton Sicard at Dalton.Sicard@forces.gc.ca
